org.mitre.synthea.engine

Class Transition.ConditionalTransition

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mitre.synthea.engine.Transition
      • org.mitre.synthea.engine.Transition.ConditionalTransition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Enclosing class:
    Transition

    public static class Transition.ConditionalTransition
extends Transition
    Conditional transitions will transition to one of several possible states based on conditional logic. A conditional_transition consists of an array of condition/transition pairs which are tested in the order they are defined. The first condition that evaluates to true will result in a transition to its corresponding transition state. The last element in the condition_transition array may contain only a transition (with no condition) to indicate a "fallback transition" when all other conditions are false. If none of the conditions evaluated to true, and no fallback transition was specified, the module will transition to the last transition defined.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
